name: Space Jam (itch) (Nathan Garbe)
description:
Space Jam is an FPS platformer made during the student Game Jam "RedJam" in 2020. The game was done solo by myself and over a period of 11 hours, it won me first place at RedJam.

The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy turrets to reach the artifact guarded by 4 of them, while moving on the moving slabs.

You can view this page here !
